posts.title: Welcome to Our Blog
posts.content: This is the first post on our new blog. We're excited to share our thoughts and experiences with you.

posts.title: Getting Started with Next.js
posts.content: Next.js is a React framework that enables server-side rendering and static site generation.
posts.excerpt: Learn how to get started with Next.js and build amazing web applications.
posts.author: Admin
